| HistoryText             = The Lords of Light and Darkness were a group of scientists who were transformed into super humans when their [[Nest (Nevada)|government lab]] was destroyed by an earthquake and they were irradiated. When the detected the [[Phoenix Force (Earth-616)|Phoenix]] onboard a plane nearby, they attacked the plane, hoping too use her energies to escape earth. They captured the Phoenix along wither her fellow [[X-Men (Earth-616)|X-Men]] and [[Spider-Man (Peter Parker)|Spider-Man]]. They were transported into space by the combinned powers of the X-Men where they transformmed again into a phenommenon thaat was perceived from earth as a new star. {{r|Marvel Team-Up Annual Vol 1 #1}}
